item.description:
Hi -

This is Rob P., the "founder" of the brand new "FREE Live Outdoor Music" MeetUp Group. Welcome!

As I mentioned in the group intro, I'm posting a bunch of freebie concerts, fireworks, etc. on this site for anyone/everyone to use - whether someone wishes to gather a group for a particular event, go solo, or not - whether I attend, or not.

As this is brand new, the word hasn't gotten out as yet, so not much interest in this evening's "Glamor Girls" in Southington. I've seen them a couple of time before and think they are great fun! I wish I had more time to get the word out.

Bottom Line: I also run a group via the "Single Event" called "Rob's Wacky Wednesday" (that I'll start posting on this site), wherby we meet a couple/few times per month to attend the new Funny Bone Comedy Club inside Manchester's Buckland Hills Mall. Had the Glamor Girls event gathered more "yes" rsvp's I would have attended that, but since not, I'm more inclined to go to the Funny Bone show @ 7:30 this evening (gather @ 6:30).

We've had from 6-24 people gather per show. I did not advertise it this week, waiting to see how the response went for "Glamor Girls", so likely just a handfull will attend this evening. Would you like to join us this evening? If so, rather than pay the $10 for this evening's show, purchase a promo tee-shirt for $15 to get in for free thie evening and almost ALL WEDNESDAY shows - whether you attend with our group or on your own. Such a deal!

Also, because I bring in a lot of business to the club, they periodically toss me some freebie tickets to the weekend shows. I have a bunch of tickets for this weekend, but depending upon the weather and free concerts status, going kayaking, etc., have yet to ascertain to which show. The weekend headliner is a VERY funny guy - Alonso Bodden, from Comedy Central's "Last Comic Standing". (Sometimes the weekend headliner performs on Wednesdays, sometimes not. It'll be a different comic this evening).

Let me know if you'd like to join us this evening and/or for the weekend show (limited # of free tickets available). The sooner, the better! If so, please share your phone number, especially cell#, so we can coordinate info, etc.

- Rob

Rob Pudney
live in Meriden / work in Bloomfield
rep06450@cox.net
C: (860) 690-9595

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Rob's Wacky Wednesday - Funny Bone Comedy Club
